products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Teal Roller Blind
products.description: With its specialised reflective lining for amazing thermal quality, this blind looks way cooler than youll feel with it dressing your window. The colour is bang on trend and will slot perfectly into a contemporary design scheme, while the richly textured, tactile fabric pr with its specialised reflective lining for amazing thermal quality, this blind looks way cooler than youll feel with it dressing your window.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Whale Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Blue may be a traditionally cooling colour, but theres a depth and texture to this blind that give it a surprising warmth. Made from soft, linen mix fabric specially finished to suit a roller blind, this thermal luxe roller is also backed with a specialised thermal lining blue may be a traditionally cooling colour, but theres a depth and texture to this blind that give it a surprising warmth.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush River Blue Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their river blue colour - perfect for those wanting to introduce a bright blue colour into their room.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Teal & Spring Roller Blind
products.description: This thermal luxe dimout teal roller blind feels bright at the window. The blue-green textured blind is finished off with a collection of spring-like pom-poms made from tightly woven threads. Whether you have a bold, maritime look in your home or simply accents of blue and whit this thermal luxe dimout teal roller blind feels bright at the window.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Blue Mist & Henley Roller Blind
products.description: As if the scandi blue colourway of this thermal luxe blind wasnt trendy enough, it also has a chic, ever so slightly kitsch decorative trim, made from woven threads in soft cream and shades of blue, to give it even more style.
